verses.content: Adam, Seth, Enos;
Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared;
Enok, Methusela, Lamek;
Noa, Sem, Ham le Japheth.
Japheth naupasalhai chu; Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Mesek le Tira an nih.
Gomer naupasalhai chu: Aske- naz, Diphath le Togarma an nih.
Javan naupasalhai chu: Elisa, Tarsis, Kittim le Rodanim an nih.
Ham naupasalhai chu: Kus, Mizraim, Put le Kanaan an nih.
Chun, Kus naupasalhai chu: Seba, Havila, Sabta, Raama le Sabteka an nih. Raama naupasalhai chu: Seba le Dedan an nih.
Kus chun Nimrod a nei a; hnuoia thilthawtheitak a hung ni ṭan tah a.
Chun, Mizraim chun Ludim, Anamim, Lehabim, Naphtuhim,
Pathrusim, Kasluhim (Philistin mihai hung suokna chu) le Kaph- torim a nei a.
Chun, Kanaan chun a nau lutirah Zidon a nei a, chun, Heth;
Chun, Jebus mihai, Amor mihai, Girgas mihai;
Hiv mihai, Ark mihai, Sin mihai;
Arvad mihai, Zemar mihai le Hamath mihai a nei a.
Sem naupasalhai chu: Elam, Assur, Arpaksad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether le Mesek an nih.
Arpaksad chun Sela a nei a, Sela chun Eber a nei a.
Eber-a chun naupasal pahni an pieng a: a pakhat hming chu Peleg a nih; ama hun lai chun hnuoi hi ṭhein a um sih a; chun, a unaupa hming chu Joktan a nih.
Joktan chun Almodad, Seleph, Hazarmaveth, Jera;
Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla;
Ebal, Abimael, Seba;
Ophir, Havila le Jobab a nei a. Hienghai po po hi Joktan naupasal- hai chu an nih.
Sem, Arpaksad, Sela,
Eber, Peleg, Reu;
Serug, Nahor, Tera,
Abram, (hi hi Abraham leh thu- hmun a nih);
Abraham naupasalhai chu Isak le Ismael.
Hi hi an inthla dân chu a nih. Ismael nau lutîr chu Nebaioth a na; chun, Kedar hai, Adbeel hai, Mibsam hai;
Misma hai, Duma hai, Massa hai, Hadad hai, Tema hai,
Jetur hai, Naphis hai, Kedema hai. Hienghai hi Ismael naupasalhai chu an nih.
Chun, Abraham thaikêm Ke- tura naupasalhai chu: Zimran le, Joksan le, Medan le, Midian le, Isbak le Sua an nih. Chun, Joksan naupa- salhai chu: Seba, Dedan.
Chun, Midian naupasalhai chu; Epha, Epher, Hanok, Abida, Eldaa an nih. Hieng po po hi Ketura naupa- salhai chu an nih.
Chun, Abraham chun Isak a nei a; Isak naupasalhai chu: Esau le Israel.
Esau naupasalhai chu: Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeus, Jalam le Kora.
Eliphaz naupasalhai chu: Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna le Amalek,
Reuel naupasalhai chu: Na- hath, Zera, Samma le Mizza.
Chun, Seir naupasalhai chu: Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Ana, Dison, Ezer le Disan.
Chun, Lotan naupasalhai chu: Hori le Homam. Timna chu Lotan farnu a nih.
Sobal naupasalhai chu: Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Sephi le Onam. Chun, Zibeon naupasalhai chu: Aia le Ana.
Ana naupasal chu Dison. Dison naupasalhai chu: Hamran, Esban, Ithran le Keran.
Ezer naupasalhai chu: Bilhan, Zaavan le Jaakan. Disan naupasalhai chu: Uz le Aran.
Tuhin hienghai hi Edom ram- a lal rorêltuhai chu an nih, chu hmaa Israel thlahai chunga lal rorêltuhai chu: Bela, Beor naupa; a khawpui hming chu Dinhaba a nih.
Bela chu a thih a, Bozra-a Zera naupa Jobab chun ama aiin ro a rêl a.
Chun, Jobab chu a thih a, ama aia chun Teman mihai rama um Husam chun ro a rêl a.
Chun, Husam chu a thih a, ama aia chun Bedad naupa Hadad, Moab phaia Midianhai hnetu khan ro a rêl a; chun, a khawpui hming chu Avith a ni nghe ngheh a.
Chun, Hadad chu a hung thih a, ama aia chun Masrekaa um Samla chun ro a rêl a.
Chun, Samla chu a thih a, ama aia chun Vadungpui panga Reho- botha um Saul chun ro a rêl a.
Chun, Saul chu a hung thih a, ama aia chun Akbor naupa Baal-hanan chun ro a rêl a.
Chun, Baal-hanan chu a thih a, ama aia chun Hadadin ro a rêl a; a khawpui hming chu Pai a nih; chun, a nuhmei hming chu Mehetabel a na, ama chu Mezahab naunu, Matred naunu a nih.
Chun, Hadad chu a thi a. Chun, Edom ram awptuhai chu: Timna, Alia, Jetheth,
Oholibama, Ela, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magdiel le Iram hai an nih. Hienghai hi Edom ram awptuhai chu an nih.
